name: Vim-spectre
tagline: Vim syntax highlighting for Cadence Design Systems spectre files.
body:
This is a very basic syntax package for Cadence Design Systems `spectre` simulator files. These are enhanced SPICE decks and so somewhat esoteric.

Any comments are welcome. :)

### Installation

I really like [vim-plug](https://github.com/junegunn/vim-plug). As a vim newbie I found it easy to install with all the functions I needed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
